Rashard Lewis

Rashard Quovon Lewis

(Sweet Lew, The Blade, Young Fella, Quiet Man)

Position: Small Forward and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-10, 215lb (208cm, 97kg)

Born: August 8, 1979 in Pineville, Louisiana us

High School: Alief Elsik in Houston, Texas

Recruiting Rank: 1998 (2)

Draft: Seattle SuperSonics, 2nd round (3rd pick, 32nd overall), 1998 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: February 9, 1999

Career Length: 16 years

  • 2x All Star
  • 2013 NBA Champ

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Rashard Lewis?

Rashard Lewis is 45 years old.

Where was Rashard Lewis born?

Rashard Lewis was born in Pineville, Louisiana.

When was Rashard Lewis born?

Rashard Lewis was born on August 8, 1979.

How tall is Rashard Lewis?

Rashard Lewis is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much did Rashard Lewis weigh when playing?

Rashard Lewis weighed 215 lbs (97 kg) when playing.

Is Rashard Lewis in the Hall of Fame?

Rashard Lewis is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Rashard Lewis drafted?

Rashard Lewis was drafted by Seattle SuperSonics, 2nd round (3rd pick, 32nd overall), 1998 NBA Draft.

What position did Rashard Lewis play?

Small Forward and Power Forward.

When did Rashard Lewis retire?

Rashard Lewis last played in 2014.

What is Rashard Lewis' net worth?

Rashard Lewis made at least $155,332,815 playing professional basketball.

How much did Rashard Lewis make?

Rashard Lewis made $21,136,631 in 2012.

What did Rashard Lewis average?

Rashard Lewis averaged 14.9 points, 5.2 rebounds, and 1.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Rashard Lewis have?

Rashard Lewis won one championship.

What schools did Rashard Lewis attend?

Rashard Lewis attended Alief Elsik in Houston, Texas.

What are Rashard Lewis' nicknames?

Sweet Lew, The Blade, Young Fella, Quiet Man are nicknames for Rashard Lewis.
